item.description:
Saturday February 11, 2012
Love Machine: Boston’s Largest Women’s Valentine’s Event

7:30 pm Speed Dating
10 pm DJ & dancing

Dyke Night’s Second Saturdays at Machine will open up early for their annual Love Machine Valentine's Party. Dyke March returns with Speed Dating and bag raffle in the Lounge. No pre-registration needed, just arrive at 7:30 pm to speed date. Speed dating is a super supportive atmosphere; you’ll have many four minute “mini” dates with multiple singles. You have nothing to lose but meeting some new single friends to do things with- and it’s a great cause.  


DJ Darrin hits the decks at 10 pm till 2 am for the largest lesbian dance party in New England. Enjoy the eye candy of the Love Machine dancers, 4 bars, and huge dance floor, with only $1 coat check.

This event is a fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March. $20 includes speed dating and dance party (7.30 open- 2 am). $10 after 9 pm for dance party only. Check out the website for up to date details about the event: www.dykenight.com

Machine Nightclub, 1254 Boylston St, Boston, MA 02215, $10/20, 21+, www.dykenight.com

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Speed Dating & Love Machine - a Dyke Night fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March
